casebody.data:
GRIFFITH
v.
STATE of NC, et al. No. 166P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC, et al. Boyd Bennett, for Bennett. Theodis Beck, for Beck. James Mitch Johnson, for Johnson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of April 2008 by Plaintiff for Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
